mapper.insert: insert into players (id, Pid, name, birthSeason, VALUE, SALARY, Nationality, SPEED, STAMINA, ITG, PASS, SHOOT, HEAD, KEEP, CONTROL, TACKL, A_PASS, SET_PALYS, EXPERIENCE, jointeam, leaveteam, had_cost ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthseason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stamina,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shoot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{head,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{control,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tackl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aPass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{setPalys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{experience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jointeam,jdbcType=DATE}, #{leaveteam,jdbcType=DATE}, #{hadCost,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update players set Pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthSeason = #{birthseason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SALARY = #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Nationality = #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPEED = #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STAMINA = #{stamina,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ITG = #{itg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PASS = #{pass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOOT = #{shoot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HEAD = #{head,jdbcType=INTEGER}, KEEP = #{keep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTROL = #{control,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TACKL = #{tackl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, A_PASS = #{aPass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SET_PALYS = #{setPalys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXPERIENCE = #{experience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jointeam = #{jointeam,jdbcType=DATE}, leaveteam = #{leaveteam,jdbcType=DATE}, had_cost = #{hadCost,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, Pid, name, birthSeason, VALUE, SALARY, Nationality, SPEED, STAMINA, ITG, PASS, SHOOT, HEAD, KEEP, CONTROL, TACKL, A_PASS, SET_PALYS, EXPERIENCE, jointeam, leaveteam, had_cost from players where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
